```{r ProcessingSteps, echo = FALSE}
CA_55M_PROCESSING_STEPS_TABLE = data.table(DATA_SET = c("CA_RAW", "CA_55M", "CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES", "CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR", "CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET"), 
                                    DESCRIPTION = c("All species, gears, and fleets", "Keep species only occurring in Indian Ocean and resolution of 5°x5°-month", "Species mapped with ASFIS code list", "Gears mapped with ISSCFG code list", "Fleets mapped with FIRMS fleet code list"), 
                                    SPECIES = c(length(unique(CA_RAW$SPECIES_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M$SPECIES_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES$species)), length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR$species)), length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET$species))), 
                                    GEARS = c(length(unique(CA_RAW$GEAR_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M$GEAR_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES$GEAR_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR$gear)),  length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET$gear))), 
                                    FLEETS = c(length(unique(CA_RAW$FLEET_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M$FLEET_CODE)),  length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES$FLEET_CODE)), length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR$FLEET_CODE)),  length(unique(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET$fleet))), 
                                    CATCH_t = c(round(sum(CA_RAW[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "t", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "t", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "t", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "t", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "t", CATCH]))),
                                    CATCH_no = c(round(sum(CA_RAW[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "no", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "no", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "no", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "no", CATCH])), round(sum(CA_55M_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET[CATCH_UNIT_CODE == "no", CATCH])))
)
```

```{r ProcessingSummaryTable}
datatable(CA_55M_PROCESSING_STEPS_TABLE, rownames = FALSE, options = list(dom = 't')) %>% formatRound(c("CATCH_t", "CATCH_no"), digits = 0) %>% formatStyle(c("CATCH_t", "CATCH_no"), `text-align` = "right")
```
